_header: The time so long the pain aye more and more
Subjects: complaints, lovers’; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: A Compleynt, the healing of the wounded lover—three stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
The tyme so long the payn ay mor and moreThat in what wyse It may
                    be long enduryd…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…Lat me not dye syth I so long haue seruedffor god yt knowyth
                    I neuer so deserued
BodFair16.Facsimiles:
Norton-Smith,  John. 
             “Introduction.” 
             Bodleian Library MS Fairfax 16.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
